messages.message:
*Mini-UATs for Instabase Active-Active (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1UkbqjgQUPVw3n7Wn-JYUJsRo0gXTFKPptvKg3AgruIo/edit#heading=h.qe7uuhm8cz0w)*

Hey everyone, I am working on a feature requested by Goldman Sachs & Standard Chartered. They have a requirement to run Instabase concurrently in two different geographic regions for high availability. As we (Instabase) donâ€™t have a setup on dogfood or prod to run Instabase in two concurrent clusters, I have created a separate environment (https://active.sandbox.instabase.com/) with two kubernetes clusters setup in separate geographic areas to simulate Goldman Sachs infrastructure.

We need your help for a mini-UAT to test out whether Flow, Refiner, File System, and general browsing is working as expected with the new setup.

I have created a mini-UAT sheet for the same: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PhXBnb39jJtAN7-rm6QpIQL9ePcIFhLBvZQVNAO24PQ/edit#gid=3507469

Could I request you to help finish these tests by Friday? Thank you so much for your time.

Please feel free to reach out to me if you have any questions.

Tagging respective test owners: @Aaron Vontell @Balaram @Youssef @Aaron Tami @Kerry @Eric Han @shaunak @Karthik S @Jonathan Shih @Kerry @Jessica @Thomas Qin

(As a reminder, please use https://active.sandbox.instabase.com/ )
